name: Get Your Head Around These! 3 Quiz | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
I'm the beginning of the end, and the end of time.

Who knows? - You might even find me at the end of this rhyme.
questions.correct: e & the letter e & an e & letter e
questions.explanation: e & the letter e & an e & letter e.

questions.text:
I'm perfect and golden if left alone.

A single word destroys me - I'm suddenly gone.
questions.explanation:
silence & quiet & peace.

	The first line plays on the expression 'silence is golden'.

questions.text:
Minerals are found in me. 

And I am found in minerals too. 

What am I?

Study these letters - B, C, D, E ,__?, P, T, V.

A letter is missing - which one could it be? 

(Read the hint.)
questions.explanation:
G & Z.

	The answer is 'G' because the letters are in alphabetical order and all rhyme. (in the US 'Z' could also be included in the list)

questions.text:
A venue to view the performing arts.

Or a place dedicated to the repair of body parts. 

What am I?
questions.explanation:
theatre & theater.

	Line two alludes to a surgical operating theatre.

questions.text:
It's happening now - the movement in water, air and cables too. 

Go with the flow my friend - the answer will come to you.
questions.correct: current & currents & a current & waves & wave
questions.explanation:
current & currents & a current & waves & wave.

	An event happening now is current. The flow of water, air and electricity in cables is also a current.

questions.text:
Looking carefully at these letters.

H, M, R, T, V, X. 

Which letter does not belong?

(Read the hint.)
questions.explanation:
R.

	All of the letters, with the exception of 'R', have correct mirror images (they are symmetrical around their vertical axis).

questions.text:
I'm often found in crosswords and other puzzles too. 

Confuse 'a ragman', and the riddle's solved for you.
questions.explanation:
anagram & an anagram.

	Solution: 'a ragman' is an anagram of anagram.

questions.text:
Remove six letters to reveal an old friend. 

SFIUXNLTERTITVEIRAS
questions.explanation:
Funtrivia & Fun Trivia.

	How it's done: you need to remove the phrase "six letters", s-(F)-i-(U)-x-(N)-l-(T)-e-(R)-t-(I)-t-(V)-e-(I)-r-(A)-s

questions.text:
I belong to you - a gift from fathers and mothers. 

Occasionally used by you - more often used by others.
questions.correct: name  & names & forename & your name & my name & a name
questions.explanation: name  & names & forename & your name & my name & a name.
